text:
Hi guys, let me show you the way to get
the largest amount of juice from all

your citrus. Let's first look inside this
lemon. It's all cell structures here, so

what we want to do is find a way to
exaggerate the amount of juice you get

out of your lime or a lemon, roll it, get
it going. Do it for about 20 seconds. This

will absolutely start breaking down the
inside cell structure. You can feel it

start to sort of get softer. Also what
you can do is use a little micro plane

to remove the skin and then simply cut
your lemon in half, squeeze through your

hands and catch any pips. As you're
squeezing it, see I'm almost moving the

lemon around in my hand. So there you go
guys, that's a super simple way of

getting the most amount of flavour and
juice from your citrus fruit. If you want
